short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use real-time statistics to help build optimized teams in Pokémon Showdown.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use data and statistics taken from thousands of recent Pokémon Showdown battles to generate analytics that can assist in teambuilding.
